Class RainbowLabel

  • public class RainbowLabel
extends Label
    A Label that randomly changes the color of the displayed text

      • act

        public void act()
        Description copied from class: Actor
        The act method is called by the Mayflower framework to give actors a chance to perform some action. At each action step in the environment, each object's act method is invoked, in unspecified order.

        The default implementation does nothing. This method should be overridden in subclasses to implement an actor's action.

        Overrides:
        act in class Label
